'''''Knightly Exam Prep''''' is the second act in [[Noelle]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed the {{Quest|A New Star Approaches}} and all endings in {{Quest|Chivalric Training}}.

==Summary==
''(To be added.)''

Having returned to [[Mondstadt City]] after exploring [[Liyue]], the [[Traveler]] finds Noelle cooped up in the library, studying.
{{clr}}

==Endings==
{{Hangout Event Endings
|character    = Noelle
|act          = 2

|ending1      = Rest Amidst the Rocks
|ending1_text = Wherever a Knight may go, the resolve to defend others goes with them.

|ending2      = "The Maid-Knight's Tale"
|ending2_text = "The Knight went west from Stone Gate with her sword in hand, and scaled the mountains of a vast new land. A legend from the moment she set foot in Liyue, tales of the adventures of the Maid-Knight would be talked about for hundreds of generations!"

|ending3      = Perfect Score
|ending3_text = Perfect score or not, now is not the time to be thinking about joining the Adventurers' Guild...

|ending4      = Points Deducted

|ending5      = The One and Only Noelle
|ending5_text = Someday, Noelle will become a knight like no other.

|ending6      = Work Made for a Maid
|ending6_text = Sometimes, it's best to stick to what you know.
